summary:
Various standalone armor patches re-balanced and readied for SkyRe.
Currently Re-making and Revising all armors for quality assurance.
Also updating for v0.99.20!
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][u]URGENT[/u][/size]

[size=4]
T3nd0 is working on yet another high-profile update involving armors and weapons.
Work on these patches will [u]CEASE[/u] in the meantime!

If by the end of the month T3nd0 has not released a [u]BETA[/u], work will [u]TEMPORARILY[/u] resume on these patches!
[/size][/center]

[color=orange]
Now that the new 0.99.20 version of SkyRe came out, ALL of these patches are outdated!
EXCEPT for the UPDATED patches in ORANGE in the \"Armor Status\" section below!

These patches are being updated whenever possible!
These new patches are also cleaned with TES5Edit prior to upload!

ANY information regarding the new update will ALSO be ORANGE, like this!


[img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/7868/skyre09920armorvalues.png[/img]

\"This should make sure that progressively better armor actually feels better, and it makes
body pieces considerably more protective than gauntlets & co. 
Remember: 10 armor -> 1% damage reduction in SkyRe. So it takes higher values to actually
make a difference.\" - T3nd0

With that said, Cloaks will NO LONGER have defensive properties, that means Realistic patches that only covered Cloaks will no longer be available.
Why? Because Cloaks with 1 AR will now only reduce Damage by 0.1%.


[/color]

[color=green]If you use it and love it, please endorse!

As of November 4, 2012 Nexus Member \"Bloodmerit\" awarded me the 100th endorsement, meaning 2.71% of you guys have endorsed so far!
Thanks to everyone who has endorsed! And I hope you have fun using my patches :D[/color]

[u][size=6][center]Standalone Armor Patches for SkyRe[/center][/size][/u]

This is my collection of various STANDALONE armor patches re-balanced and readied for SkyRe. I\'ll take requests, but I won\'t do skimpy armors.
I update quite often, even armors that I have uploaded long ago. Expect revisions often until I find the perfect balance of of Work and Reward.
[color=yellow]
I post Articles for every SkyRe patch I make, read \'em!
As a matter of fact, ALWAYS read the Articles! Those are my changelogs!
Plus, they look spiffy with spreadsheets!
[/color]
I would appreciate if you guys left some comments about changes you might like, optional versions, or bugs you find, thanks.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Installation Instructions[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow][Normal Armors][/color]
Install the main mod  you downloaded a patch for, then de-select or delete their original ESPs.
Now install these patches below the SkyRe Main ESP.
Done.

[color=yellow][Optional][/color]
If you want to merge leveled lists, use Wrye Bash.
Wrye Bash can compile the SkyRe leveled lists and any other leveled lists added by other mods together so they work flawlessly.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Special Instructions[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow][Armors With BSA Files][/color]
Install the main mod  you downloaded a patch for, then de-select or delete their original ESPs.
Now install these patches below the SkyRe Main ESP.
Finally, rename the Armors\' BSA/BSL files to match the ESP file name.
(ex. SkyRe Mithril Armor.esp, SkyRe Mithril Armor.bsa, SkyRe Mithril Armor.bsl)
Done.

[color=yellow][List of Armors With BSA/BSL Files][/color]
Mithril Armor
Seratic Armor
Xenius\' Armor Compilation (XAC)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Troubleshooting[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[color=yellow]
If the armor does not show up, try redownloading and reinstalling the MAIN mod.
This problem is usually caused by missing or corrupted files, which can be caused by corrupted downloads.

If the armor still doesn\'t show up, check the list above to find out if that armor has a BSA/BSL file (or both) and follow the special instructions.
[/color]
When an author just places their armor in a storage unit (Barrel, chest, etc.) I delete that storage unit and simply add the armor to the Crafting system.

Authors sometimes leave random records in their esp files or edit vanilla records which might cause issues for some users.

If the spreadsheet is cropped while viewing the Articles, click on the name of the Article and then click on the word \"here\" in the sentence beneath.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Urgent News[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow]September 19th, 2012[/color]

I\'m Re-making alot if not all of my finished armor patches to ensure they are bug free and give them much needed polish. I\'am also ditching the old \"text only\" Article pages and creating new ones with some awesome spreadsheets!

I\'ll be removing the older \"text only\" Articles as I re-make more patches and make their Spreadsheet Articles.

[color=yellow]September 24, 2012[/color]

All armors that have not been Re-made will be put in the \"old\" category, however they are still usable.
This is just for convenience.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Important Notes![/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=orange]
These are notes pertaining to the NEW 0.99.20 update:

[s]With the new Armor (And Projectile) Value tables provided by T3nd0, I will use the current Armor Rating (AR) that I have now to determine the Armor Material Value (AMV) I will use for that specific armor/armor piece.

However, now that Ebony has a higher defensive value than Dragonplate, I\'m gonna have to rework armors with defensive values in that range.[/s]

All Armor Ratings will be recalculated using T3nd0\'s new values, shown above.

[u]Armors WITHOUT projectile data will be done first.[/u]
[/color]

[color=yellow]These are notes pertaining to both, SkyRe and my patches:[/color]

The Advanced Armors Perk is known as \"Nordic Design\" in SkyRe

\"Capes\" are Helmet replacers for the sake of having good naming conventions.
The stats for these will scale to the Helmet\'s stats. Realistic versions will scale differently.

\"Cloaks\" are the ones fluttering on your back.
The Standard versions have an AR* of 1, Realistic versions have no defensive properties at all.
[size=1]*Armor Rating[/size]

\"Worn Accessories\" like the skirt in the Avatar of Grenth armor will be significantly lowered as well.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Spreadsheet Info[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow]Here are a few quick things I want to point out:[/color]

1) When I leave a blank space that means that that particular stat was unchanged.

2) If stats have changes in the \"Standard\" column, but don\'t have changes in the \"Realistic\" column; that means the stats are carried over.

3) When you see \" | \" that means those stats are equal to whatever is at the ends (Top and Bottom) of the line.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Armor Status[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow]If you have any requests put \'em in the  *Armor Requests Discussion thread!
When requesting something, make sure it\'s an actual standalone armor.
Because it\'s impossible to make patches for re-textures....
For example, the aMidianBorn Armors, are all Vanilla Armor Retextures.
[size=1]*Please only post requests in there, I want to keep it as clean and orderly as possible[/size][/color]

[color=teal]Guardian Plate Armor - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
Nordic Conqueror Armor - [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
[color=teal]Chinese General Armor and Weapon - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
Sicarius Armor - [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
[color=teal]Heroic Dwarven Armor - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
Mystic Elven Armor - Revised
[color=teal]Divine Aegis Armor - Released[/color]
Equipment of Eternal Shine - Released
[color=teal]Dark Nemesis Armor - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
Avatar of Balthazar - [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
[color=teal]Iron Armor w/ Chainmail - [/color] [color=orange] 0.99.20[/color]
Rogue Sorceress Outfit - [color=orange] 0.99.20[/color]
[color=teal] Mithril Armor - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
tehxen\'s Chainmail Hauberks - Released
[color=teal] Xenius\' Armour Compilation - Released [/color]
Seratic Armor - [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]
[color=teal] Avatar of Grenth - [/color] [color=orange]0.99.20[/color]

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=4]Upcoming Patches[/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[color=yellow]These will come after I finish Re-making all current patches.[/color]
[color=yellow]Armor Requests will be considered after these are done.[/color]
